# inverted

**Instance Property**

The inverse of this anchor, which matches at every position that this anchor does not.

## Declaration

```swift
var inverted: Anchor { get }
```

## Discussion

For the [doc://com.apple.Swift/documentation/RegexBuilder/Anchor/wordBoundary] and [doc://com.apple.Swift/documentation/RegexBuilder/Anchor/textSegmentBoundary] anchors, the inverted version corresponds to `\B` and `\Y`, respectively.
title: inverted
